thread.title: Howard Liberman Joins Wilkinson Barker Knauer
thread.title_full: Howard Liberman Joins Wilkinson Barker Knauer

author: admin
title: Howard Liberman Joins Wilkinson Barker Knauer
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Wilkinson Barker Knauer, LLP 
WASHINGTON -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Wilkinson Barker Knauer, LLP is pleased to announce that Howard Liberman has moved his practice to the firm, joining as a partner effective today. After beginning his career as an attorney with the Federal Communications Commission’s Cable Television Bureau, Mr. Liberman moved to the private sector where he has represented broadcasters (television and radio, commercial and noncommercial), cable TV operators and private radio licensees in the full range of matters relating to regulatory proceedings, transactions, and strategic planning and litigation, including FCC hearings and appeals of FCC decisions. He also advises lenders and investors in the communications and telecommunications industries. 
A leading figure in the mass media communications bar, Mr. Liberman has served as co-chair of the Federal Communications Bar Association’s Mass Media Practice and Transactional Practice Committees, and received the FCBA’s Distinguished Service Award in 2009. He has consistently maintained an “AV Preeminent” rating in both legal ability and ethical standards from Martindale Hubbell, and was named a Super Lawyer ® in Communications Law for 2013, 2014 and 2015. Mr. Liberman received his B.S. with honors from Emerson College, and earned his J.D. from Brooklyn Law School. 
Bryan Tramont, Managing Partner of Wilkinson Barker Knauer, said, “Our team has long admired Howard’s tremendous skills and top-notch practice – we are excited to have him on board as we continue our strategic expansion.” Mr. Liberman commented, “I am excited to join Wilkinson Barker, many of whose attorneys I have known and respected for decades, and to be reunited with colleagues with whom I have worked in the past. The firm’s talented team of media and telecom lawyers provides a perfect platform for my practice and I look forward to participating in the firm’s continued growth.” 
Wilkinson Barker Knauer, LLP, one of the largest law firms in the nation dedicated primarily to the practice of communications and energy law, is ranked as a “first tier” firm by Chambers USA (Telecom, Broadcast, and Satellite: Regulatory), and Legal 500 (Telecoms and broadcast: regulatory), and was twice named “ Law Firm of the Year ” in communications law by U.S. News - Best Lawyers (2012 & 2014). The firm, with offices in Washington, D.C. and Denver, Colorado, advises clients ranging from global Fortune 100 companies to small start-ups in regulatory, transactional, privacy, trademark, corporate and litigation matters involving all aspects of communications and energy law, at both the state and federal levels. 
More on Mr. Liberman can be found at http://www.wbklaw.com/Our_Team/Howard_Liberman and additional information about Wilkinson Barker Knauer can be found at http://www.wbklaw.com . Mr. Liberman can be reached at (202) 383-3373. View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20151016005434/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
